version_description:
- All-new ability to pre-fill an entry before the bracket is revealed.
- Once the field is set, create up to 25 brackets.
- All-new News experience in Tournament Challenge to keep you informed with game predictions and analysis.
- Bracketcast, ESPN's live scoring experience, returns with an updated design and improved functionality.
- New widget optimized for iOS 10. 
- Game-by-game preview videos included this year with analysis for every team in the field.
- Updated More Games section with Women's Tournament Challenge, Tournament Challenge Second Chance, and ESPN Fantasy App.

-Can’t wait for the matchups to be announced? Pre-fill your bracket before the teams are even revealed!
-Once the field is set, create up to 25 brackets for your chance to win prizes.
-Stay informed on the latest tournament predictions and analysis from our college basketball experts.
-Game-by-game preview videos from bracket expert Joe Lunardi give you the inside scoop on every matchup.
-Now optimized for iOS 11 and iPhone 8/8+ and iPhone X. 
-Performance and bug fixes.

-Can’t wait for the matchups to be announced? Pre-fill your bracket before the teams are even revealed!
-Once the field is set, create up to 25 brackets for your chance to win prizes.
-Stay informed on the latest tournament predictions and analysis from our college basketball experts.
-Game-by-game preview videos from bracket expert Joe Lunardi give you the inside scoop on every matchup.
-Now optimized for iOS 11 and iPhone 8/8+ and iPhone X. 
-Performance and bug fixes.

-Once the field is set, create up to 25 brackets for your chance to win prizes.
-Stay informed on the latest tournament predictions and analysis from our college basketball experts.
-Game-by-game preview videos from bracket expert Joe Lunardi give you the inside scoop on every matchup.
-Now optimized for iOS 11 and iPhone 8/8+ and iPhone X. 
-Performance and bug fixes.

[+] Updated home screen layout makes it easier to track your brackets, including your max possible score for each bracket.  Crushing it? We’ll throw some  flames on there to let you know. Bracket busted? Watch out for those ice cubes.
[+] Sort your brackets by score to keep tabs on your best... And to push that busted bracket out of view!
[+] Start a free trial of ESPN+ to gain the edge on your competition. From Bracket Predictor and Bracket Analyzer to expert analysis, you’ll get game-by-game insights to help you win. As a subscriber,  you also get access to thousands of live streaming events and ESPN originals on ESPN.com, ESPN App, and connected TV devices.
[+] Nobody wants to be lonely.  Now you can join up to 10 groups per bracket to compete against friends, other fans, celebrities, and ESPN personalities.

[+] Updated home screen layout makes it easier to track your brackets, including your max possible score for each bracket. Crushing it? We’ll throw some flames on there to let you know. Bracket busted? Watch out for those ice cubes.
[+] Sort your brackets by score to keep tabs on your best... And to push that busted bracket out of view!
[+] Start a free trial of ESPN+ to gain the edge on your competition. From Bracket Predictor and Bracket Analyzer to expert analysis, you’ll get game-by-game insights to help you win. As a subscriber, you also get access to thousands of live streaming events and ESPN originals on ESPN.com, ESPN App, and connected TV devices.
[+] Nobody wants to be lonely. Now you can join up to 10 groups per bracket to compete against friends, other fans, celebrities, and ESPN personalities.

[+] Our new "Finish My Bracket" feature lets you start a bracket with some picks you feel good about, and then let ESPN do the rest! Try picking your Champion and letting "Finish My Bracket" fill in the rest, either randomly or using our Smart Bracket logic powered by ESPN's Basketball Power Index (BPI).

[+] Updated bracket design makes it smoother to follow your brackets.

[+] Subscribe to ESPN+ to gain the edge on your competition. From Bracket Predictor and Bracket Analyzer to expert analysis, you'll get game-by-game insights to help you win. As a subscriber, you also get access to thousands of live streaming events and ESPN originals on ESPN.com, ESPN App, and connected TV devices.

[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

[+] Our new "Finish My Bracket" feature lets you start a bracket with some picks you feel good about, and then let ESPN do the rest! Try picking your Champion and letting "Finish My Bracket" fill in the rest, either randomly or using our Smart Bracket logic powered by ESPN's Basketball Power Index (BPI).

[+] Updated bracket design makes it smoother to follow your brackets.

[+] Subscribe to ESPN+ to gain the edge on your competition. From Bracket Predictor and Bracket Analyzer to expert analysis, you'll get game-by-game insights to help you win. As a subscriber, you also get access to thousands of live streaming events and ESPN originals on ESPN.com, ESPN App, and connected TV devices.

[+] Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- We miss college hoops, but are already gearing up for the 2020-21 college basketball season in advance of Tournament Challenge 2021!
- We are redesigning the bracket, making it easier than ever to make and see your picks.
- We are fixing bugs and making the app faster and more performant.
- Come back and check for updates in advance of Tournament Challenge 2021!

- Women’s Tournament Challenge is now in the Tournament Challenge App! Fill out up to 25 brackets for the women’s tournament and you could have a chance to win great prizes!
- Our new “Finish My Bracket” feature lets you start a bracket with some picks you feel good about, and then let ESPN do the rest! Try picking your Champion and letting “Finish My Bracket” fill in the rest, either randomly or using our Smart Bracket logic powered by ESPN’s Basketball Power Index (BPI).
- We streamlined and modernized the app for 2021 to give you the smoothest bracket experience.
- Subscribe to ESPN+ to gain the edge on your competition. From Bracket Predictor and Bracket Analyzer to expert analysis, you’ll get the game-by-game insights to help you win. As a subscriber, you also get access to thousands of live streaming events and ESPN originals on ESPN.com, ESPN App, and connected TV devices.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
